data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Sennar, Sudan to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sennar, Sudan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Sennar, Sudan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary: On average, 122 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sennar, Sudan.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Sennar, Sudan today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Over 95.01 percent of the people of Sennar are far from Jesus.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Aka people.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,502,000 people living in Sennar through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Sennar, Sudan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Sennar, Sudan has a population of 1,502,000.

We estimate Sennar has 5,814 people who might know Jesus, 69,064 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,427,122 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Sennar, Sudan.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

location.name: Sennar
location.cities_list: Singa, Sinnar, As Sūkī, Maiurno, Ad Dindar
location.cities_list_w_pop: Singa (250,000), Sinnar (130,122), As Sūkī (33,524), Maiurno (28,727), Ad Dindar (15,144)
